item.title: Audrey add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "May you live every day of your life." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Learn from the mistakes of others. You can never live long enough to make them all yourself." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Michael Levine
item.description: "Having children makes you no more a parent than having a piano makes you a pianist." -- Michael Levine

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
